name: Flappy Jump - Unity Complete Game Source Code
name_original: Flappy Jump - Unity Complete Game Source Code
description:
Test it here (WebGL)

Or download the test apk file and test it on your android device

This project have integrated banner, interstitial and rewarded AdMob ads
To setup the ads follow these steps:

  • Go to Assets - > Google Mobile Ads -> Settings and put your app id (from your AdMob console) there.
  • Open ads.cs script and put your ad ids

Tap the screen to jump. Match the areas with the same color as the ball. If you touch the wrong color the game is over. As it progresses the game becomes harder and harder. Collect stars and use them to buy new items in the shop menu.
